library(tidyverse)

data <- read.csv("alcohol_global.csv", sep=",", header=TRUE)

beer <- data %>%
  select(country, beer_servings) %>%
  filter(beer_servings > 0) %>%
  #group_by(beer_servings) %>%
  #summarise(total = count(beer_servings))
  count(beer_servings)

A <- ggplot(beer) +
  geom_bar(aes(x=beer_servings, y=n), stat="identity")

plot(A)
